/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the overcast sky, their monotone palette punctuated by occasional splashes of red and blue. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Amidst the urban landscape, patches of greenery provide a refreshing contrast, hinting at the presence of trees and parks scattered throughout the city.
